content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy If you are in your final year of study, this section has information to help you decide what to do next. Everything you need to know about graduation ceremonies, including dates and times, a checklist and how to order a gown. Find out about available opportunities, as well as funding, accommodation and our Graduate School through the online postgraduate prospectus. There are a host of services and facilities available for Nottingham alumni: from careers advice to reunions and discounts. Discover how you can benefit. The Careers team can help you find graduate opportunities, apply for postgraduate courses or jobs, gain work experience and much more â€“ check out their Graduating in 2024 webpage.
